comments.body: The documentation is great but I think its misplaced.  The Connection class is generic enough to work with any connection plugin that implements rpc.  These documentation strings are better served in cliconf, netconf plugins imho

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +96,100 @@            return partial(self.__rpc__, name)

    def __rpc__(self, name, *args, **kwargs):
        """Executes the json-rpc and returns the output received
           from remote device.
